title: Enforcement; criminal penalties
context: ยง145-25 Enforcement; criminal penalties. Violations of this part or any rule adopted pursuant thereto shall be criminal offenses as follows: (1) A violation in which the value of the agricultural commodity exceeds $100 shall be a class C felony; and (2) A violation in which the value of the agricultural commodity is $100 or less shall be a misdemeanor. [L 1999, c 186, pt of ยง2; am L 2003, c 20, ยง4; am L 2012, c 125, ยง4]
